00035 #include <SeExpression.h>
00036 #include <cstdlib>
00037 #include <cstdio>
00038 #include <cstring>
00042 
00043 class GrapherExpr:public SeExpression
00044 {
00045 public:
00047     GrapherExpr(const std::string& expr)
00048         :SeExpression(expr)
00049     {}
00050 
00052     void setX(double x_input)
00053     {x.val=x_input;}
00054 
00055 private:
00057     struct SimpleVar:public SeExprScalarVarRef
00058     {
00059         double val; // independent variable
00060         void eval(const SeExprVarNode* node,SeVec3d& result)
00061         {result[0]=val;}
00062     };
00063     
00065     mutable SimpleVar x;
00066 
00068     SeExprVarRef* resolveVar(const std::string& name) const
00069     {
00070         if(name == "x") return &x;
00071         return 0;
00072     }
00073 };
00074 
00075 
00076 
00077 int main(int argc,char *argv[])
00078 {
00079     std::string exprStr="\
00080                          $val=.5*PI*x;\
00081                          7*sin(val)/val \
00082                          ";
00083     if(argc == 2){
00084         exprStr=argv[1];
00085     }
00086     GrapherExpr expr(exprStr);
00087 
00088     if(!expr.isValid()){
00089         std::cerr<<"expression faield "<<expr.parseError()<<std::endl;
00090         exit(1);
00091     }
00092     double xmin=-10,xmax=10,ymin=-10,ymax=10;
00093     int w=60,h=30;
00094     char *buffer=new char[w*h];
00095     memset(buffer,(int)' ',w*h);
00096 
00097     // draw x axis
00098     int j_zero=(-ymin)/(ymax-ymin)*h;
00099     if(j_zero>=0 && j_zero<h){
00100         for(int i=0;i<w;i++){
00101             buffer[i+j_zero*w]='-';
00102         }
00103     }
00104     // draw y axis
00105     int i_zero=(-xmin)/(xmax-xmin)*w;
00106     if(i_zero>=0 && i_zero<w){
00107         for(int j=0;j<h;j++){
00108             buffer[i_zero+j*w]='|';
00109         }
00110     }
00111 
00112     // evaluate the graph
00113     const int samplesPerPixel=10;
00114     const double one_over_samples_per_pixel=1./samplesPerPixel;
00115     for(int i=0;i<w;i++){
00116         for(int sample=0;sample<samplesPerPixel;sample++){
00117             // transform from device to logical coordinatex
00118             double dx=double(sample)*one_over_samples_per_pixel;
00119             double x=double(dx+i)/double(w)*(xmax-xmin)+xmin;
00120             // prep the expression engine for evaluation
00121             expr.setX(x);
00122             // evaluate and pull scalar value
00123             SeVec3d val=expr.evaluate();
00124             double y=val[0];
00125             // transform from logical to device coordinate
00126             int j=(y-ymin)/(ymax-ymin)*h;
00127             // store to the buffer
00128             if(j>=0 && j<h)
00129                 buffer[i+j*w]='#';
00130         }
00131     }
00132 
00133     // draw the graph from the buffer
00134     for(int j=h-1;j>=0;j--){
00135         for(int i=0;i<w;i++){
00136             std::cout<<buffer[i+j*w];
00137         }
00138         std::cout<<std::endl;
00139     }
00140 
00141     return 0;
00142 }
